section.title: Adding Non Contiguous VLAN Ranges
section.para: &PRODUCT; provides you with the flexibility to add non contiguous VLAN ranges to your network. The administrator can either update an existing VLAN range or add multiple non contiguous VLAN ranges while creating a zone. You can also use the UpdatephysicalNetwork API to extend the VLAN range.

listitem.para: Log in to the &PRODUCT; UI as an administrator or end user.
Ensure that the VLAN range does not already exist.
In the left navigation, choose Infrastructure.
On Zones, click View More, then click the zone to which you want to work with.
In the Guest node of the diagram, click Configure.

Click Edit
edit-icon.png: button to edit the VLAN range.
The VLAN Ranges field now is editable.
Specify the start and end of the VLAN range in comma-separated list.
Specify all the VLANs you want to use, VLANs not specified will be removed if you are adding new ranges to the existing list.
